description:
NTS Map: 093H08
The trailhead has a sign at the beginning and the trail is marked with both markers and flagging tape. The trail follows Ozalenka creek, which is crosses several times before coming to the hut. The Hut is operated by the Ozalenka Alpine Club. To reserve call 250-569-2596. Trailhead coordinates are: N53 14 32 W120 24 25, elev. 1291m, Hut coordinates are: N53 17 51 W120 27 51, elev. 1726m.
 In winter please check the Avaluator (Online Trip Planner) rating: Simple.More trip planner route details here.
directions: The trail head is located 19 km down the West Dore forest road. The start of the road is on the western edge of McBride where the Dore river crosses the Yellowhead highway. The road is unplowed in the winter so access is usally done via snow mobile to the trailhead.
title: Ozalenka Hut
